title: Royal Court Conspiracy
narrative: You've been invited to the royal court for a private audience with the king. As you wait in the antechamber, you overhear two nobles whispering about a plot against the crown. One of them glances nervously in your direction, clearly aware you've heard too much.

choices.text: Confront them directly about what you heard
Pretend you heard nothing and proceed to your audience
Slip away quietly and inform the royal guards
